name: The Divine Speaker
description:
The Divine Speaker is a story-rich 18+ BL/yaoi visual novel where you'll follow alongside Raen, an orphan from the secluded city of Aurelia Cavella.

Expelled from his home on a death sentence, his adventure will take him all over a world he didn't even know existed.

Mysteries, magic, fantasy and more await you in this grand tale of fate, and how each person defies it.
